item.title: Trump Redirects Millions to Historically Black Colleges, Charter Schools
item.description: The Trump administration is cutting money from programs that have supported minority students, including at other universities.

item.title: Starvation and Bombs in Besieged Sudanese City As Residents Cry for Help
item.description: At least 260,000 civilians trapped in El Fasher face a dire choice: risk being starved or bombed if they stay, and raped or killed if they flee.

item.title: Rubio, in Israel, Says a Diplomatic Solution to Gaza War May Not be Possible
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel to discuss President Trump’s desire to see the war in Gaza end soo...

item.title: Bobby Hart, Who Helped Give the Monkees Their Music, Dies at 86
item.description: The hit songwriting duo he and Tommy Boyce formed in the 1960s was best known for the unexpectedly popular tunes of a made-for-TV band.

item.title: Elon Musk Buys $1 Billion in Tesla Stock as Board Defends His Pay
item.description: Tesla’s chief executive bought the stock after the company’s board proposed paying him nearly $1 trillion if he achieves certain performance goals.
